short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mail any website to your Inbox with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your inbox is your life? MailMe is a simple and fast Chrome extension that allows you to send any website to your inbox with a single click. It couldn't be easier.
